attributes.action: Make the Isle of Wight a duty free zone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are several duty free zones within the EU, Andorra and Livigno (Italy) to name just two.
The Island, which qualifies as an under developed and deprived area by several EU measures would be able to benefit from the additional visitor numbers with increased spend etc.
